level_table.class_features: Defense Bonuses, Lightsaber , Starting Feats , Talent

hit_points_level_1: Jedi begin play at 1st level with a number of hit points equal to 30 + Constitution modifier. At each level after 1st, Jedi gain 1d10 hit points + their Constitution Modifier.
hit_points_per_level: Jedi gain a number of Force Points equal to 5+ one-half their character level (rounded down) at 1st level, and every time they gain a new level in this Class . Any Force Points left over from the previous levels are lost.
credits: A 1st-level Jedi starts play with 3d4 x 100 credits.

hit_points_level_1: Nobles begin play at 1st level with a number of hit points equal to 18 + their Constitution modifier. At each level after 1st, Nobles gain 1d6 hit points + their Constitution modifier.
hit_points_per_level: Nobles gain a number of Force Points equal to 5 + one-half their character level (rounded down) at 1st level, and every time they gain a level in this Class . Any Force Points left over from previous levels are lost.
credits: A 1st level Noble starts play with 3d4 x 400 credits.

hit_points_level_1: Scoundrels begin play at 1st level with a number of hit points equal to 18 + their Constitution modifier. At each level after 1st, Scoundrels gain 1d6 hit point + their Constitution modifier.
hit_points_per_level: Scoundrels gain a number of Force Points equal to 5 + one-half their character level (rounded down) at 1st level, and every time they gain a new level in this class. Any Force Points left over from previous levels are lost.
credits: A 1st-level Scoundrel starts play with 3d4 x 250 credits.

hit_points_level_1: Scouts begin play at 1st level with a number of hit points equal to 24 + their Constitution modifier. At each level after 1st, Scouts gain 1d8 hit points + their Constitution modifier.
hit_points_per_level: Scouts gain a number of Force Points equal to 5 + one-half their Character Level (rounded down) at 1st level, and every time they gain a new level in this class. Any Force Points left over from previous levels are lost.
credits: A 1st level Scout starts play with 3d4 x 250 credits.

hit_points_level_1: Soldiers begin play at 1st level with a number of hit points equal to 30 + their Constitution modifier. At each level after 1st, Soldiers gain 1d10 hit points + their Constitution modifier.
hit_points_per_level: Soldiers gain a number of Force Points equal to 5 + one-half their Character Level (rounded down) at 1st level, and every time they gain a new level in this class. Any Force Points left over from previous levels are lost.
credits: A 1st-level Soldier starts play with 3d4 x 250 credits.
